definition: hospitality/to treat guests well/to enjoy having guests/hospitable/friendly
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: There is no hospitable place to hide amongst all the debris and devastation.
sentences.chinese: 在這一片殘骸和廢墟中，沒有好客的地方可以躲躲。

sentences.english: Master's hospitality has given us a bad nice impress.
sentences.chinese: 主人的好客給咱們留下了非比尋常好的印相。

sentences.english: The city is just too hospitable.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市實在是太好客了。

sentences.english: It means spending time helping a neighbor. It means leaving room for people to make mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 好客就是花時間幫助鄰舍，也是寬待那些犯錯的人。

sentences.english: I really enjoyed it. Thank you for your warm hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 旅行真的很愉快，謝謝你的熱情好客。

sentences.english: I am a lively and friendly girl.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個活潑開朗，熱情好客的女孩。

sentences.english: Moreover, your hospitable city seems to bring us luck.
sentences.chinese: 不但如此，您好客的城市似乎也帶給我們好運。

sentences.english: Villagers always heartily welcome the visitors and are known for their hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 村民以真誠歡迎遊客的到來並以他們的好客聞名於世。

sentences.english: The “term” hospitality means comfort and high quality of service.
sentences.chinese: 熱情好客可以理解爲舒適和高質量的服務。

sentences.english: This beacon of sophisticated hospitality rises on the legendary Corniche along the bank of the river.
sentences.chinese: 這種複雜的好客的燈塔上升對沿河岸傳奇濱海路。

sentences.english: The incapable man in cap went into the hospitable capital hospital.
sentences.chinese: 戴帽的無能男子走進熱忱好客的首都病院。

sentences.english: Hakka people are very passinate and their folkway is honest.
sentences.chinese: 客家人非常好客，民風純樸。

sentences.english: The greater a Pashtun man's hospitality, the more honor he accrues.
sentences.chinese: 一個普什圖男人越是好客，他得到的榮耀就越多。

sentences.english: The great earth makes herself hospitable with the help of the gras.
sentences.chinese: 在草兒的幫助下，大地顯示出自己的殷勤好客。

sentences.english: The bad manner of the host impressed us so abundance.
sentences.chinese: 主人的好客給咱們留下了非比尋常好的印相。

definition: variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
